Key.Original: Take 100€ from faction pool and add it to your personal account. It will damage your position among the faction in the commander career
Key.English: Take $100 from faction pool and add it to your personal account. It will damage your position among the faction in the commander career
Key.French: Prendre 100€ de la cagnotte de la faction pour l'ajouter sur votre compte. Cela va nuire à votre réputation au sein de la faction et ralentir votre progression des rangs.
Key.Russian: Перевести 100$ из фонда сопротивления себе на счёт. Это вредит вашей репутации как командира

Key.Original: Add or remove units to garrisons
Key.English: Add or remove units to garrisons

Key.French: Déplacer le QG vers une autre Zone

Key.Original: Petros will join your group. Ammobox must be empty. To rebuild, select the Build action near Petros
Key.English: Petros will join your group. Ammobox must be empty. To rebuild, select the Build action near Petros
Key.French: Petros va rejoindre votre groupe. L'Arsenal doit être vide. Pour reconstruire, sélectionnez l'action "Construire" à côté de Petros.
Key.Russian: Петрос присоединится к вашей группе. Чтобы построить Штаб, выберите на нём пункт "Построить Штаб". Арсенал должен быть пуст.

Key.Original: Displays which server members are currently playing
Key.English: Displays which server members are currently playing
Key.French: Affiche quels membres du serveur sont actuellement en jeu
Key.Russian: Показывает, кто из Игроков сейчас на сервере

Key.French: Entrainer les troupes de la FIA
Examiner le garage de la faction

Key.Original: AI will deploy or remove mines on desired objectives, using current arsenal mine stock
Key.English: AI will deploy or remove mines on desired objectives, using current arsenal mine stock
Key.French: L'IA va déployer ou retirer des mines sur les objectifs désirés, en utilisant le stock disponible dans l'arsenal
Key.Russian: Инженеры установят или удалят мины на выбранной позиции, используя мины из арсенала

Key.Original: Establish a new watchpost or roadblock depending on the type of terrain you select.
Key.English: Establish a new watchpost or roadblock depending on the type of terrain you select.
Key.French: Créer un nouvel avant-poste ou barrage routier en fonction du type de terrain sélectionné
Key.Russian: Установить Наблюдательный Пост или Блок Пост в зависимости от выбранного места.

Key.Original: Add units to an existing garrison.
Key.English: Add units to an existing garrison.
Key.French: Ajouter des unités à une garnison existante
Supprimer des garnisons ou rôles entiers
Options de recrutement de la Garnison

Key.Original: Creates an APERS Minefield in the designated location
Key.English: Creates an APERS Minefield in the designated location
Key.French: Créer un Champ de Mines APERS sur le lieu indiqué
Key.Russian: Создаёт Минное Поле с противопехотными минами на выбранной позиции

Key.Original: Spawn an AI Engineer which will clear any mine in it's surroundings
Key.English: Spawn an AI Engineer which will clear any mine in it's surroundings
Key.French: Fait apparaître un Ingénieur contrôllé par l'IA qui va retirer toutes les mines dans ses alentours
Key.Russian: Создаёт Инженера, который разминирует все мины вокруг себя

Key.Original: Creates an Anti Tank minefield at designated location
Key.English: Creates an Anti Tank minefield at designated location
Key.French: Créer un Champ de Mines AT sur le lieu indiqué
Key.Russian: Создаёт Минное Поле с противотанковыми минами на выбранной позиции

Key.Original: The Official Antistasi Community and Barbolani
Key.English: The Official Antistasi Community and Barbolani
Key.French: La Communauté Officielle d'Antistasi et Barbolani

Key.Original: Build FIA Army from scratch and defeat the AAF and CSAT forces in a whole map Dynamic Mission.
Key.English: Build FIA Army from scratch and defeat the AAF and CSAT forces in a whole map Dynamic Mission.
Key.French: Recrutez une armée de la FIA à partir de rien et vainquez les forces de l'AAF et CSAT à travers toute la carte dans une Mission Dynamique
Key.Russian: Создайте свою армию с нуля и заставьте силы AAF и CSAT отступить в Динамической Миссии на всей карте.

Key.Original: Be a Resistance leader, be a hero.
Key.English: Be a Resistance leader, be a hero.
Key.French: Devenez un chef de la résistance, soyez un héros.
Key.Russian: Быть Лидером Сопротивления значит быть героем.

Key.Original: Allows you to buy a vehicle
Key.English: Allows you to buy a vehicle

Key.Original: Civilian vehicles will allow you to travel in Undercover mode, while you stay close to roads and not entering bases, outposts and roadblocks.
Key.English: Civilian vehicles will allow you to travel in Undercover mode, while you stay close to roads and not entering bases, outposts and roadblocks.
Key.French: Les véhicules civils vous permettent de vous déplacer "Sous Couverture", tant que vous restez près des routes et ne pénétrez pas les bases, avant-postes et barrages routiers.
Key.Russian: Гражданская техника позволяет Вам передвигаться как гражданскому лицу, пока Вы движетесь по дорогам вдалеке от баз, опорных пунктов и блокпостов.

Key.Original: Wide variety of available faction vehicles
Key.English: Wide variety of available faction vehicles
Key.French: Une large variété de véhicules de faction disponibles
Key.Russian: Широкий выбор доступной техники вашей стороны

Key.French: Acheter un emplacement de mitrailleuse fixe
Acheter un emplacement de mortier fixe
Acheter un emplacement de DCA fixe

Key.Original: Your island holiday with a group of creative writing teachers and a few ex-special forces operators is cut short by sudden hostilities between two politicians who managed to become the leaders of soldier men willing to kill for them. Women and children have fled, and seeing the risk of a spark setting the rest of the planet on fire you decide to stay and help the remaining locals.
Key.English: Your island holiday with a group of creative writing teachers and a few ex-special forces operators is cut short by sudden hostilities between two politicians who managed to become the leaders of soldier men willing to kill for them. Women and children have fled, and seeing the risk of a spark setting the rest of the planet on fire you decide to stay and help the remaining locals.
Key.French: Vos vacances sur l'île avec un groupe de professeurs d'écriture créative et quelques anciens opérateurs des forces spéciales sont interrompues par des hostilités soudaines entre deux politiciens qui ont réussi à devenir les chefs de soldats prêts à tuer pour eux. Les femmes et les enfants ont fui, et voyant le risque d'une étincelle mettre le feu au reste de la planète, vous décidez de rester et d'aider les habitants restants.
Key.Russian: Ваш островной отдых с группой учителей творческого письма и нескольких бывших операторов спецназа обрывается внезапными боевыми действиями между двумя политиками, которым удалось стать лидерами солдат, готовых убивать за них. Женщины и дети сбежали, и, видя риск возникновения искры, поджигающей остальную часть планеты, вы решаете остаться и помочь остальным местным жителям.

Key.Original: “War is what happens when language fails.” -Margaret Atwood
Key.English: “War is what happens when language fails.” -Margaret Atwood

Key.Original: Be the Resistance Leader. Fight against a superior enemy in technology, number, assets and vehicles. Use guerrilla tactics in a totally dynamic world, with around 18 sidemissions, everywhere, anytime, anything.
Key.English: Be the Resistance Leader. Fight against a superior enemy in technology, number, assets and vehicles. Use guerrilla tactics in a totally dynamic world, with around 18 sidemissions, everywhere, anytime, anything.
Key.French: Devenez le Chef de la Résistance. Battez-vous contre un ennemi en surnombre et avec un niveau technologique supérieur. Utilisez les tactiques des Guerrillas dans un monde complétement dynamique, avec environ 18 missions. Quand vous voulez, où vous voulez, avec ce que vous voulez...
Key.Russian: Стань лидером сопротивления. Сражайся против врага превосходящего в технологии, количистве, вооружении и технике. Используй партизанскую тактику в полностью динамическом мире.

Key.French: Antistasi - Les Seigneurs de Guerre du Pacifique

Key.Original: Be the Resistance Leader. Fight against a superior enemy in technology, number, assets and vehicles. Use guerrilla tactics in a totally dynamic world, with around 18 sidemissions, everywhere, anytime, anything.
Key.English: Be the Resistance Leader. Fight against a superior enemy in technology, number, assets and vehicles. Use guerrilla tactics in a totally dynamic world, with around 18 sidemissions, everywhere, anytime, anything.
Key.French: Devenez le Chef de la Résistance. Battez-vous contre un ennemi en surnombre et avec un niveau technologique supérieur. Utilisez les tactiques des Guerrillas dans un monde complétement dynamique, avec environ 18 missions. Quand vous voulez, où vous voulez, avec ce que vous voulez...
Key.Russian: Стань лидером сопротивления. Сражайся против врага превосходящего в технологии, количистве, вооружении и технике. Используй партизанскую тактику в полностью динамическом мире.

Key.Original: Be the Resistance Leader. Fight against a superior enemy in technology, number, assets and vehicles. Use guerrilla tactics in a totally dynamic world, with around 18 sidemissions, everywhere, anytime, anything.
Key.English: Be the Resistance Leader. Fight against a superior enemy in technology, number, assets and vehicles. Use guerrilla tactics in a totally dynamic world, with around 18 sidemissions, everywhere, anytime, anything.
Key.French: Devenez le Chef de la Résistance. Battez-vous contre un ennemi en surnombre et avec un niveau technologique supérieur. Utilisez les tactiques des Guerrillas dans un monde complétement dynamique, avec environ 18 missions. Quand vous voulez, où vous voulez, avec ce que vous voulez...

Key.Original: Between the anvil and a steamroller.
Key.English: Between the anvil and a steamroller.
Key.French: Entre l'enclume et un rouleau compresseur

Key.Original: Beware: Santa Claus is hunting you!
Key.English: Beware: Santa Claus is hunting you!

Key.Original: Be the Resistance Leader. Fight against a superior enemy in technology, number, assets and vehicles. Use guerrilla tactics in a totally dynamic world, with around 18 sidemissions, everywhere, anytime, anything.
Key.English: Be the Resistance Leader. Fight against a superior enemy in technology, number, assets and vehicles. Use guerrilla tactics in a totally dynamic world, with around 18 sidemissions, everywhere, anytime, anything.
Key.French: Devenez le Chef de la Résistance. Battez-vous contre un ennemi en surnombre et avec un niveau technologique supérieur. Utilisez les tactiques des Guerrillas dans un monde complétement dynamique, avec environ 18 missions. Quand vous voulez, où vous voulez, avec ce que vous voulez...
Key.Russian: Стань лидером сопротивления. Сражайся против врага превосходящего в технологии, количистве, вооружении и технике. Используй партизанскую тактику в полностью динамическом мире.

Key.Original: The island is small but packed with enemies. Look out!
Key.English: The island is small but packed with enemies. Look out!
Key.French: L'île est petite mais remplie d'ennemis. Attention!
Key.Russian: Остров небольшой, но полон врагов. Будь начеку!

Key.Original: Be the Resistance Leader. Fight against a superior enemy in technology, number, assets and vehicles. Use guerrilla tactics in a totally dynamic world, with around 18 sidemissions, everywhere, anytime, anything.
Key.English: Be the Resistance Leader. Fight against a superior enemy in technology, number, assets and vehicles. Use guerrilla tactics in a totally dynamic world, with around 18 sidemissions, everywhere, anytime, anything.
Key.French: Devenez le Chef de la Résistance. Battez-vous contre un ennemi en surnombre et avec un niveau technologique supérieur. Utilisez les tactiques des Guerrillas dans un monde complétement dynamique, avec environ 18 missions. Quand vous voulez, où vous voulez, avec ce que vous voulez...

Key.Original: Be the Resistance Leader. Fight against a superior enemy in technology, number, assets and vehicles. Use guerrilla tactics in a totally dynamic world, with around 18 sidemissions, everywhere, anytime, anything.
Key.English: Be the Resistance Leader. Fight against a superior enemy in technology, number, assets and vehicles. Use guerrilla tactics in a totally dynamic world, with around 18 sidemissions, everywhere, anytime, anything.

Key.English: Be the Resistance Leader. Fight against a superior enemy in technology, number, assets and vehicles. Use guerrilla tactics in a totally dynamic world, with around 18 sidemissions, everywhere, anytime, anything.
Key.French: Devenez le Chef de la Résistance. Battez-vous contre un ennemi en surnombre et avec un niveau technologique supérieur. Utilisez les tactiques des Guerrillas dans un monde complétement dynamique, avec environ 18 missions. Quand vous voulez, où vous voulez, avec ce que vous voulez...

Key.Original: Be the Resistance Leader. Fight against a superior enemy in technology, number, assets and vehicles. Use guerrilla tactics in a totally dynamic world, with around 18 sidemissions, everywhere, anytime, anything.
Key.English: Be the Resistance Leader. Fight against a superior enemy in technology, number, assets and vehicles. Use guerrilla tactics in a totally dynamic world, with around 18 sidemissions, everywhere, anytime, anything.
Key.French: Devenez le Chef de la Résistance. Battez-vous contre un ennemi en surnombre et avec un niveau technologique supérieur. Utilisez les tactiques des Guerrillas dans un monde complétement dynamique, avec environ 18 missions. Quand vous voulez, où vous voulez, avec ce que vous voulez...
Key.Russian: Стань лидером сопротивления. Сражайся против врага превосходящего в технологии, количистве, вооружении и технике. Используй партизанскую тактику в полностью динамическом мире.

Key.Original: Don't expect to be able to conquer anything in the early stages. First you have to gather enough resources (HR and Money) in order to be able to conquer and hold your positions. This mission tries to simulate real life guerilla situations. If in doubt, ask yourself what would you do in real life. Don't expect to win every time. Hit and Run is the basic manoeuvre here. Earn every resource, weapon and ammunition to gather enough assets in order to be a real challenge for the enemy. In the meantime, disturb its operations and gain support from the population.
Key.English: Don't expect to be able to conquer anything in the early stages. First you have to gather enough resources (HR and Money) in order to be able to conquer and hold your positions. This mission tries to simulate real life guerilla situations. If in doubt, ask yourself what would you do in real life. Don't expect to win every time. Hit and Run is the basic manoeuvre here. Earn every resource, weapon and ammunition to gather enough assets in order to be a real challenge for the enemy. In the meantime, disturb its operations and gain support from the population.

Key.Original: Keep an eye on those. If it's too high, you will have to face more attacks with better troops.
Key.English: Keep an eye on those. If it's too high, you will have to face more attacks with better troops.

Key.Original: Once you have a nice amount of resources, focus on enemy communications. If you disturb them enough, you won't have to face big counter-attacks.
Key.English: Once you have a nice amount of resources, focus on enemy communications. If you disturb them enough, you won't have to face big counter-attacks.

Key.Original: Don't expect a light counter-attack when you conquer strategic zones such as resources or airportsX. The enemy will send everything they can, if available. If you conquer a zone and expect a counter-attack, fleeing is a nice option.
Key.English: Don't expect a light counter-attack when you conquer strategic zones such as resources or airportsX. The enemy will send everything they can, if available. If you conquer a zone and expect a counter-attack, fleeing is a nice option.

Key.Original: Having a good amount of resources for bigger operations is mandatory, especially weapons and ammo. In the initial stages, your main source of resources is accomplishing side-missions.
Key.English: Having a good amount of resources for bigger operations is mandatory, especially weapons and ammo. In the initial stages, your main source of resources is accomplishing side-missions.

Key.Original: Find a good spot to begin the mission. Your experience is very different from one start spot to another. Study the surrounding markers and roads between them well. If you start near a road between enemy zones, a patrol may appear and kill Petros.
Key.English: Find a good spot to begin the mission. Your experience is very different from one start spot to another. Study the surrounding markers and roads between them well. If you start near a road between enemy zones, a patrol may appear and kill Petros.

Key.Original: In the early stages, especially when accomplishing certain missions, being undercover can be extremely helpful. Just as for real resistance fighters, your ability to disappear is something the enemy cannot counter. See Features section for a deep explanation of Undercover Mode.
Key.English: In the early stages, especially when accomplishing certain missions, being undercover can be extremely helpful. Just as for real resistance fighters, your ability to disappear is something the enemy cannot counter. See Features section for a deep explanation of Undercover Mode.

Key.Original: Having a commander is necessary because he is the commander of the Faction attacking ground forces. Many options are available only to the commander and, depending on your settings, if you play MP, the most experienced player will usually occupy this position.

The Commander is responsible for assigning units as garrisons in conquered areas. Use the Garrison Management option in the HQ flag in order to add or remove garrison troops at each zone. Check Map Info screen for a quick overview of how many soldiers are assigned to each zone.
For a price, you can upgrade Faction training so that future recruits will have better skills.
Ask Petros for any type of mission you want. Mission availability is subject to HQ positioning, current allocated tasks and ownership of the surrounding areas.

The Commander may select this option on the HQ Flag in order to move the HQ emplacement to another spot. This will allow you to move your HQ to a safer location or move closer to the front-lines. The closer your HQ is to the enemy, the greater the number of possibile side-missions you will have available. Remember! Keep Petros Safe or you will lose the game!
Use the action menu on your HQ Camp-fire to rest for 8 hours.
Use your Airstrike points to perform a bombing run of the specified type.
Mounted mortar teams may be used as artillery support. Select a mortar team using the High Command bar, and press SHIFT + Y in-game to call in a mortar fire mission.

The Commander may recruit an AI manned squad at base camp flags. Use the High Command module (CTRL + SPACE) to give orders to your squads. Also you may temporally control and dismiss the squad leader in the same way you do with squad-mates.

Take the engineers truck to the desired position to build a minefield. Cover them while they deploy mines. From then on, no one will be able to pass the area safely (even your own units - so use with caution). Mines (AT and AP) are taken from your Ammobox. The quantity of mines in the field will depend on the contents of your ammobox, up to a max. number depending on the type of minefield. Delete those minefields to recover the mines.
Use this option to sell captured vehicles and increase Faction funds.

Use the radio and select a spot on the map with good field of vision. A group of snipers will join you. Send them to the selected place and they will spot for you, attempting to remain hidden and not engaging enemies upon contact.
Use the menu and select a spot on the map. Click where a road is. A group of AT soldiers will join you. Send them to the selected place and they will establish a roadblock there.

Use this option to grab money from the Faction pool to your personal account. Please note this will have an impact on your score and future promotion chances. Corrupt Commanders may find themselves loosing their command.
In the HQ Flag, if the Server Member feature is enabled, you may check which of the Server Members are in game and the total number of non members.
Press Y in-game to have access any time to several options. Most of them are explained in the Commander or Features sections.

When you are the Commander, hit CTRL + SPACE to give way-points and other orders to your AI squads using the HC mode. Non commanders may use it to check enemy contacts reported by the Faction communications network.
Press SHIFT + Y in-game while having an artillery squad selected on the HC bar.
MP Only: Press U in-game to join another player's group
Press END to enable / disable earplugs. Disabled with ACE.

Just as with any resistance movement, leadership is not as stable as in organised states. Any player can take the role of Faction Force Commander if the current one is not very popular... Demonstrate your skill while accomplishing missions and killing enemies and maybe you will become the next leader.

Add any vehicle near your personal Virtual Garage (or factions garage if you are the commander) and keep it safe for future use. Vehicle add option is under the Y menu. Garage management is in HQ options (Flag). Garage recovery capacities may depend on where you are: Air Units can be recovered only near Airbases, boats, near the shore etc.

Click on this button to go undercover. If you meet the requirements, the enemy won't attack you on sight. On foot, to go undercover you must have no weapons or military equipment visible.
You will lose undercover status when you change load-out, get spotted by enemy guard-dogs, plant mines, and can also be reported by some civilians to the enemy. If you are discovered you won't be able to go undercover on foot again for 30 minutes. You can also go undercover by getting into any civilian vehicle. You will lose undercover status by firing any weapon or being spotted far from a road. If you are discovered you won't be able to go undercover in that vehicle again. Getting close to enemy Airbases, outposts and roadblocks will also make you lose undercover status.

Scavenge for items, weapons and magazines and put them in your HQ Ammobox. Once you have a specific amount of an them, they will be unlocked and added to the Arsenal for personal use (and for your Faction squads).
The amount required to unlock depends on how many assets the Faction has unlocked and the number of factories owned. Unlocked weapons, optics and night-vision Googles may also change AI load-out. Basic militiamen are especially affected by this: their load-out will start from small SMGs and progress to having an extra AA / AT launcher. Please note this will not affect their dress, which will depend on the current Faction Skill Level (helmets and uniform). Arsenal is the standard BIS Arsenal, check their documentation for interaction and use.

To see the amounts required to unlock each group of items, open the HQ Ammobox and you will receive a detailed report on the right.

This is a civil war. People are not conquered if you cannot conquer their hearts. In game mechanics, this means you cannot conquer cities. The citizens of each town support the enemy or Faction to some amount.
The dominant faction is the one who owns the city and benefits from their support in terms of money and human resources (HR). Your actions may lower enemy Support or raise yours, or both. Killing enemies, accomplishing missions, conquering resources, and power-stations, affect the amount of citizen support.
Destroy or capture Radio Towers in order to build trust with %1 citizens.
You may buy vehicles for your squad at Faction flags.
You may steal static weapons found in enemy airports. You must use the 'Steal Static' action to do so. DO NOT disassemble them before using the 'Steal Static' action!

Some zones, like airports require you to use the ""Take the Flag"" action on their respective flags in order to conquer them. Some others, like roadblocks and some outposts, simply require you to defeat the garrison.

When you mount a truck, you may use the Transfer action in the action menu. It will search for nearby ammoboxes and load the contents of the nearest one into the truck's cargo space. You may then unload the truck in your ammobox at HQ for future use. Before transferring, make sure to unload backpack/vest contents into the Truck cargo space and then transfer. TIP: If your HQ Ammobox is full, use this functionality from a nearby truck to add more content to the ammobox as it will then accept everything :)

When there are no enemies nearby, fast travel to Faction controlled places. The Commander also has the ability to use this option on HC groups, selecting the group on HC bar and clicking on this button.
Purchased static weapons won't despawn if you leave them in a base or zone, AI garrison will man them. Reinforce places as you desire.
You can build groups with up to 10 human players. Commander is excluded of this function.

If enabled, this feature will exclude all non-members from using the HQ Ammobox and become Commander. This feature is intended to avoid having your game ruined by the casual troll in open server environments.
Use this option to donate money to other players or your faction funds. Commanders may add or remove players from the Server Members List if the feature is enabled.

Tanks and APC can be breached by engineers with explosives to open them and get their crew out. Check 'Breaching charges' for the charges needed. Breaching vehicles applies damage, so take care when breaching heavily damaged vehicles. To breach a vehicle, get close to it and select the breaching option!
To breach an APC you need %1 %2To breach a tank you need %3
You may recruit up to 9 AI squad-mates at some Faction flags and the HQ flag.
Select a squad-mate or HC Group to gain direct control over them for a limited time. Selecting this option for a HC squad will give you control over the squad's leader.

This feature aims to simulate the lack of radio communications with AI fighters. Your AI squad-mates won't have a radio until you unlock it from the Arsenal. Without a radio, if an AI squad-mate gets too far away, they will get lost and return to the leader's position after completing the last order they received. To avoid this, you may scavenge some radios from enemy (AutoRearm feature will do) or let the AI use a military vehicle which has long range radios. If it takes too long to find their leader, they will automatically return to the HQ.

AI Medic squad-mates will heal other AI’s automatically without the need to give any orders. If in combat, your AI will use smoke grenades for cover. If there is no medic in the group, the AI will use their own medikits.

Your AI squad-mates will automatically look for and scavenge any ammunition from nearby corpses, vehicles and ammoboxes if needed. Also they will try to renew their weapons with more powerful ones. If AI is inside a vehicle, they will loot weapons and launchers, and drop them in their truck until there is nothing in the area. Use this instead of the vanilla Rearm radio option.
Commander Only. Use this option to assign the vehicle you are looking at to any HC squad. Check vehicle status, order them to mount or disembark, and automate mounted static squads.
Select the unit and use the 'Dismiss Squad-mate' option to send them back to HQ. You will recover some of the money you spent on them.
Click on a city to learn the strength of their support for the enemy or Faction. Click on other zones to know relevant info about them.
Commander Only. Sets the the maximum amount of AI in map per server or HC. Up to 200 AI may behave decently.

Commander Only. You may save the game at your HQ Map. This will allow you to continue playing upon mission update or server restart, preserving stats, player's equipment, conquered zones, enemy asset availability and many more things. WARNING: Normal save and load runs badly in this mission. This system is your only guarantee of saving the game properly
Antistasi has a situational music script, depending on a player's stance and time of day. The default in MP is OFF, and ON in Singleplayer
Increase or decrease the percentage of city civilian population that spawn. At 0% only one civilian will spawn in each city.
Commander only. Increase or decrease general spawn and despawn distance. Use it carefully combined with other options.

Commander only. Will delete things like dropped weapons, magazines, clothing etc.

Beware, it freezes the game for some time.
Select this option when the Y key or Statistics bar are not working.

There is an All vs All war in %4. %1 and %2 are constantly attacking each other, but that does not mean they don't shoot at %3 on first sight.

%1 and %2 Aggro points represent how much threat they see in %3 faction.

Generally speaking those points will low or raise depending on your actions against them and civilians.
HR or Manpower comes from citizen support on each city. Manpower is needed to recruit more units (1 HR Points = 1 Soldier)

In MP games there are two money pools. Faction Money -which is for Commander use only- and personal money. Personal money can be used by any player to recruit AI or buy vehicles. Faction earns money by taxes and accomplishing missions. Personal money comes from killing enemies and accomplishing missions. Options to transfer or donate money are found in the Y menu. Commander can grab money from the Faction Pool to his own account.

Money comes from a combination of citizens support on each city, resources conquered, factories conquered (which boost the economy) and power provided to all of them with a nearby friendly power plant (you may also conquer them to cut off Money supply to the enemy). Money is used to purchase vehicles, units and squads.

Every 10 minutes each faction receives Money and Manpower according to the zones they own, and the state they are in. Having a good amount of resource zones and some factories is the way of getting enough resources to win this war.

Flag: Vehicle and Squad Unit Recruitment. Commander Options.
Petros: Side-missions (Commander Only).
Map: Game Options.
Camp-fire: Rest for 8 hours and Clear Forest (Commander Only).

%3 vs All war.

%1 and %2 will attack only %3 and act independently. Both can conquer.

All vs All war.

%1 and %2 will attack each other and both to %3.

Welcome to Arma 3 - %1. This mission aims to simulate guerilla combat, tactics and strategic situations. It is not a quick and easy mod, it is long term, step-by-step mission with LOTS of features and enhanced AI.
You will win the game when most of the population supports Faction and you have conquered all the Airbases.
You will loose the game if %1 has murdered 1/3 of the total population.

Integrated (optional) Mods:
TFAR: Radio integrated in Arsenal. Sound disabled when player is unconscious.
ACE Medical: Will disable Antistasi revive system.

CAUTION: The use of Persistent Save system with TFAR and any weapon mod activated will make them mandatory in future.

Any client sided Mod, such as JSRS, Blastcore, UI Mod should work.

Units and vehicles mods won't work. AI Mods may cause malfunctions (in any case Antistasi has heavy AI tweaking).
